metadata.title: CVE-2023-48727 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: NULL pointer dereference in some Intel(R) oneVPL software before version23.3.5 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable informationdisclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: onevpl package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
